channel.title: [PI] Mac Webclient error (retry 5,4,3,2,1...)

item.title: [PI] Mac Webclient error (retry 5,4,3,2,1...)
item.dc:creator: @dzeko dzeko
item.description:
@dzeko wrote:

blazkiller123:

Nothing is wrong, u need to make a whole different web client for Mac users, way it dl’d cache, etc. might as well not care about Mac users. 70-80% of Rsps users are on windows

First i aint punk. I will never “not care” about my players. If i’m making this topic is maybe that i want to fix it and not go the way “oh shit happens”…
And i know that cache goes in “user.home” for mac’s.
And i’m pretty sure my method have something wrong.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Mac Webclient error (retry 5,4,3,2,1...)
item.dc:creator: @dzeko dzeko
item.description:
@dzeko wrote:

so my mac users can’t load my webclient.
They get count down, “please retry in 5,4,3,2,1…”

here is my fincachedir method in signlink.java…

public static String findcachedir() { String as[] = {"user.home"}; if(storeid < 32 || storeid > 34) storeid = 32; String s = "kawfan_cache_mac"; for(int i = 0; i < as.length; i++) try { String s1 = as[i]; if(s1.length() > 0) { File file = new File(s1); if(!file.exists()) continue; } File file1 = new File(s1 + s); if(file1.exists() || file1.mkdir()) return s1 + s + "/"; } catch(Exception _ex) { } return null; }

What’s wrong?

Read full topic
